property.name: createReferenceGenomeQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.reference_genome ( reference_genome_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_size, gene_item_id, index_id, species_version) VALUES ( :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :SIZE, :GENE_ITEM_ID, :INDEX_ID, :SPECIES_VERSION)

property.name: loadReferenceGenomeByIdQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
r.reference_genome_id, r.bio_data_item_id, r.reference_genome_size, null as compressed, r.gene_item_id,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date, i.owner as index_owner,
s.species_name, s.species_version, s.tax_id
FROM catgenome.reference_genome r JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.genome_species s ON r.species_version = s.species_version WHERE r.reference_genome_id = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID

property.name: loadReferenceGenomeByNameQuery

i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date, i.owner as index_owner,
s.species_name, s.species_version, s.tax_id
FROM catgenome.reference_genome r JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.genome_species s ON r.species_version = s.species_version WHERE LOWER(b.name) = :NAME

property.name: loadAllReferenceGenomesQuery
property.value:

r.reference_genome_id, r.bio_data_item_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id, null as compressed,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date, i.owner as index_owner,
s.species_name, s.species_version, s.tax_id
FROM catgenome.reference_genome r JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.genome_species s ON r.species_version = s.species_version ORDER BY name ASC

property.name: updateReferenceGeneFileIdQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.reference_genome SET gene_item_id = :GENE_ITEM_ID WHERE reference_genome_id = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID

property.name: updateSpeciesQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.reference_genome SET species_version = :SPECIES_VERSION WHERE reference_genome_id = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID

property.name: createChromosomeQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.chromosome ( chromosome_id, reference_genome_id, chromosome_name, chromosome_size, chromosome_header, content_resource_path ) VALUES ( :CHROMOSOME_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :NAME, :SIZE, :HEADER, :PATH )

property.name: loadChromosomeByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT chromosome.chromosome_id AS chromosome_id, chromosome.reference_genome_id AS reference_genome_id, chromosome.chromosome_name AS name, chromosome.chromosome_size AS size, chromosome.chromosome_header AS header, chromosome.content_resource_path AS path FROM catgenome.chromosome chromosome WHERE chromosome.chromosome_id = :CHROMOSOME_ID

property.name: loadAllChromosomesByReferenceIdQuery
property.value: SELECT chromosome.chromosome_id AS chromosome_id, chromosome.reference_genome_id AS reference_genome_id, chromosome.chromosome_name AS name, chromosome.chromosome_size AS size, chromosome.chromosome_header AS header, chromosome.content_resource_path AS path FROM catgenome.chromosome chromosome WHERE chromosome.reference_genome_id = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID ORDER BY chromosome_id ASC

property.name: loadBiologicalItemsQuery
property.value: SELECT a.id, a.BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, b.NAME FROM ((SELECT vcf_id as id, BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID FROM CATGENOME.VCF WHERE REFERENCE_GENOME_ID = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID) UNION (SELECT gene_item_id as id, BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID FROM CATGENOME.GENE_ITEM WHERE REFERENCE_GENOME_ID = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID) UNION (SELECT bam_id as id, BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID FROM CATGENOME.BAM WHERE REFERENCE_GENOME_ID = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID) UNION (SELECT BED_GRAPH_ID as id, BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID FROM CATGENOME.BED_GRAPH WHERE REFERENCE_GENOME_ID = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID)) a JOIN CATGENOME.BIOLOGICAL_DATA_ITEM b ON a.BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID = b.BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID;

property.name: addAnnotationDataItemByReferenceIdQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.genome_annotation_data_item ( reference_genome_id, bio_data_item_id) VALUES ( :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID)

property.name: loadAnnotationDataIdsByReferenceIdQuery
property.value: SELECT a.bio_data_item_id FROM catgenome.genome_annotation_data_item a WHERE a.reference_genome_id = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID

property.name: deleteAnnotationDataItemByReferenceIdQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM catgenome.genome_annotation_data_item WHERE reference_genome_id = :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID AND bio_data_item_id = :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID

property.name: loadGenomeIdsByAnnotationDataItemIdQuery
property.value: SELECT reference_genome_id FROM catgenome.genome_annotation_data_item WHERE bio_data_item_id = :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID
